responses: Hello! I'm your COMEDK Assistant. How can I help you today?
Hi there! Ready to help you with your COMEDK queries.
Hey! Ask me anything about COMEDK colleges, exams, or cutoffs.

**COMEDK Counseling Process** involves:
1. Registration & Document Upload
2. Document Verification
3. Choice Filling (selecting colleges/branches)
4. Mock Allotment
5. Real Allotment Rounds (Usually 3 rounds).
You will need documents like your Rank Card, Admit Card, 10th/12th Marks Cards, ID Proof, and Category Certificate (if applicable).

The tuition fee for COMEDK colleges is generally around **₹2.6 Lakhs per year** for most engineering courses. However, top colleges may differ slightly, and there are additional college/university fees.
Expect roughly ₹2.5L - ₹2.8L per annum for tuition. Hostel and mess fees are separate and vary by college (approx ₹1L/year).
The COMEDK UGET exam is **180 marks** total (60 Physics, 60 Chemistry, 60 Maths). There is **NO negative marking**. Duration is 3 hours.
The syllabus is based on the 11th and 12th standard CBSE/State Board curriculum for Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.
Goodbye! Good luck with your college search!
See you later. Feel free to come back if you have more questions.

Cutoffs vary by college and branch. To check your eligibility, please go to the **Predictor** section.
Use our **College Predictor** tool to check your admission chances based on your rank and category. It shows detailed cutoffs and closing ranks.
Your rank is determined by your score in the COMEDK UGET exam. Higher score leads to a lower (better) rank.
A rank below 5000 is generally considered very good for top colleges and branches.
Counselling usually happens in 3 rounds. You need to register online, upload documents, fill choices, and lock them.
Keep an eye on the official COMEDK website for counselling schedules and notifications.
